translations: n.迷你吧（旅馆房间内的小冰箱）

sentences.sentence: Rooms are spacious and come with marble bathrooms, minibars and satellite TV as well as free Wi-Fi.
sentences.translation: 客房宽敞并且配备大理石浴室、迷你吧、卫星电视以及免费无线网络连接。

sentences.sentence: The spacious rooms at Hotel Villa Kapetanovic have air conditioning, flat-screen TV, minibars and work desks.
sentences.translation: 每个房间都设有私人阳台、空调和平面电视。

sentences.sentence: No5 Boutique Art Hotel offers luxury Port Elizabeth accommodations. Each guestroom features flat-screen televisions, minibars, safes, private terraces, espresso coffee maker, king-size beds, and more.
sentences.translation: 5精品艺术酒店提供豪华的伊丽莎白港住宿。每个客房功能平板电视，冰箱，保险箱，私人阳台，意大利浓咖啡咖啡机，特大号的床，和更多的。
